title: Researchers Uncover ECScape Flaw in Amazon ECS Enabling Cross-Task Credential Theft
description: Cybersecurity researchers have demonstrated an "end-to-end privilege escalation chain" in Amazon Elastic Container Service (ECS) that could be exploited by an attacker to conduct lateral movement, access sensitive data, and seize control of the cloud environment.
